Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A classic cocktail glass slides across the table.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Didn't think you knew how to mix drinks.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jack of all trades, remember?', 3: '9', 4: 'I made it special for you.', 5: '9'}
{3: "This is a pretty faithful recreation of the original. Ice, spirits, sugar, bitters, all shaken together. But using a synthetic alcohol electrolyte solution as the base? That's a first for you."}
{3: "You found a bar in Constellia that hasn't been touched yet, and they actually have real alcohol. It reminds you of times only Chrome would understand."}
{3: 'Chrome takes a sip as offered, then gently sets the glass down.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Now I see why you wanted me to calibrate my taste system.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Back to the good old days, huh?', 3: '14'}
{3: 'You used to be a bartender in New Oakley, but this drink brings back memories of those rare moments of leisure at F.O.S.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "My old days with this drink were mostly Smith's gatherings, and then after graduation. You too, right? After that, not many chances to just... be like this.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Maybe it's the alcohol talking—even with reduced electrolyte, Chrome is getting chattier."}
{2: 'Yeah, always the wrong occasion.', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'There was a time when alcohol was also off-limits for me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you can take the glass away, Chrome reaches out too, holding it steady.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Isn't alcohol supposed to mess with your head? I hate the feeling of losing control.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Before I can control others, I need to control myself first.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Under the warm yellow light, Chrome's hair shimmers like champagne. As always, he sits perfectly upright, even at the bar."}
{2: "Don't put too much pressure on yourself, alright?", 3: '26'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'What you didn\'t say is, "It wouldn\'t hurt to loosen up a little... with me by your side."', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Those blue eyes glint through the glass, his gaze hidden by the liquid, yet still sharp.'}
{3: 'It is enough to draw a smile, and you take the glass back.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'How about a walk outside?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chrome places a set of car keys on the table, sliding them across to you where they land in your hand.'}
{2: 'You actually managed to get your hands on those?', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Kamui had been adamant about seeing a car from the Golden Age, and I never expected to stumble upon a dealership here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'How does it feel?', 3: '36'}
{3: "He runs his fingers over the distinct real leather of a Golden Age-styled key fob. It is a stark contrast to the synthetic ones he's used to."}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Gasoline brake, manual transmission—the very essence of the Golden Age.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Irresistible.', 3: '39', 4: 'Might as well give it a try.', 5: '39'}
{3: 'As if in a silent trade, Chrome once again takes the glass from your hand and drains the remaining contents in one smooth gulp.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Let's do it.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory534.jpg'}
{3: 'The engine purrs, smooth and steady like a country singer humming a homesick tune.'}
{3: "The evening breeze sneaks through the car window, playing with a strand of the young Construct's golden hair."}
{3: 'He normally would have tidied it up.'}
{3: 'But tonight, he just glances at the rearview mirror and keeps his gaze forward.'}
